text: Rumors that Kim Kardashian wants her surrogate to carry triplets for her have been proven false by comments she made herself. The story began in Closer, where a a report suggested that Kardashian wanted to have triplets as a birthday surprise for her husband, Kanye West. The article, headlined : “ Kim : ‘ Surprising Kanye With Triplet News Will Save Our Marriage,'” also indicated that their marriage was crumbling, though that too appears to be unfounded. In the piece, sources claimed that Kardashian is “ keen to set the wheels in motion for her next surrogacy.'' Alleged insiders said that she intends to “ complete her family with triplets. ” They went on to frame it as a birthday gift,
